// src/Signup.js
import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Signup=_ref=>{let{onSignup}=_ref;const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:"",gender:"",age:"",bikeCount:"",mobile:"",password:""});const handleChange=e=>{setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();localStorage.setItem("user",JSON.stringify(formData));alert("Signup successful!");onSignup();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:styles.container,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83D\uDE80 Sign Up"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,style:styles.form,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"name",placeholder:"Name",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"gender",placeholder:"Gender",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"age",type:"number",placeholder:"Age",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"bikeCount",type:"number",placeholder:"No. of Bikes",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"mobile",type:"tel",placeholder:"Mobile Number",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"password",type:"password",placeholder:"Password",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Register"})]})]});};const styles={container:{padding:20,maxWidth:400,margin:"auto"},form:{display:"flex",flexDirection:"column",gap:10}};export default Signup;
